data.title: Yasashii Kankei
data.synopsis: Naoya is a car salesman and when he goes to drop off the keys for a new client, he realizes that it's his childhood friend Tsukasaki who he hasn't seen since junior high. After Naoya's co-worker sexually harasses him, he begins to live with Tsukasaki, but will things be just like they were before? (Source: MU)

data.title: 35 do no Renai Netsu
data.synopsis: Honda is a pharmacist who is overworked due to the hospitalization of his co-worker (who he's secretly in love with). Luckily, one of his customers, Sasashi, turns out to be a doctor who is looking for a job. Honda immediately hires him, but then learns that not only was he fired from his previous job for embezzeling, but he's a notorious playboy too. (Source: MU)

data.title: Breakfast Club
data.title_japanese: ブレックファースト・クラブ
data.synopsis: Yaoi series of stories about life in a boy's dorm at a high school. The main couple in the first volume is Masamoto and Izuka, who are roommates. Masamoto saves Izuka from prostitution. There is also Hiroki who is sleeping with his teacher the dorm manager. Vol.1: Breakfast Club Vol.2: Room Mate Vol.3: Bed Time Vol.4: Pillow Talk Vol.5: Door to Door (Source: MU)

data.title: Kimi ga Neiki wo Tateru made
data.title_japanese: 君が寝息をたてるまで
title_synonyms: Koi no Hanasaku Yoru mo Aru
data.synopsis: 1-2. Kimi ga Neiki wo Tateru made (Till You Make Sleeping Noises) 3-4. Koi Monogatari 5. Koi no Hanasaku Yoru mo Aru

data.title: My Bodyguard
title_synonyms: The Lucky Star of the Night
data.synopsis: 1. Plan O.N.O. 2. Lip Service 3. Shiawase no Hoshi no Yoru (The Lucky Star of The Night) 4. Holiday 5. My Bodyguard 6. Partner 7. Wagamama Fukushachou Nacchi (Stubborn Vice-President Nacchi)

data.title: One-Way Ticket of Love
data.synopsis: Collection of one-shots. (Twoshot story + 6 oneshots) 1. Micky House 2. ? 3. Piyua 4. ? 5. Me.Ba.E - The new laid back teacher bothers prim and proper teacher Morishita. 6. One Way Ticket of Love - New worker goes a business trip with his super cool sempai. 7. Karachi Yuto Usagi Chin (Source: Manga Updates)

data.title: Renai no Kamisama ni Ie
data.synopsis: Ryuuzaki is the athletic team's idol, but having been called a 'mermaid' by the swim team's Toya, he becomes determined to find out why. Watch as the story between these two individuals collides in this high school romance. (Source: Liquid Passion)

data.title: Trip
data.synopsis: 1. Trip 2. Actress 3. Draw 4. Red Light 5. Dole Smile 6. Work Over Time 7. The Unlucky Letter

data.title: Yogoto no Tsuki
data.synopsis: Fresh-faced artist, Kojima Yoshimi, used to be the lover of the art gallery’s owner, Shibano. While diverting more of his attention upon his work, another man suddenly steps into the picture, and he apparently cares very deeply for Yoshimi… other than the titled story, “Yogoto no Tsuki,” this book also includes the expressive, heartfelt tales of young players; isolated, top-class businessmen; and the thin and fragile love between males. (from B-U)

data.title: Sokonashi Freefall Romance
data.title_japanese: 底なし・フリーフォールロマンス
title_synonyms: Ore to Kareshi to Aitsu to Kare
data.synopsis: Collection of six oneshots: 1. The first story takes place at school and is about a wild, slacker seme and his over-protective uke. 2. Ore to Kareshi to Aitsu to Kare (Me and my boyfriend, him and his Boyfriend) A story of bestfriends who gets along very well. The other even gets to see how his best friend gets fucked by the boyfriend, every night. A funny and somewhat sad story. 3. A story of a man who married a woman who's 10 years older; a story of this man and his stepson, to be precise. 4. Kajou na Aijou, Shinratsu na Gekijou (Too Mush Affection, Bittersweet Passion) The uke got fucked by colleagues, not by the boyfriend. And it's not one colleague, it's five! Rare huh?! 6. Fathomless Cage A brutal rapist/robber and his victim. (Source: MangaUpdates)

data.title: Paraphrase
title_synonyms: On the Other Side of the Fog
data.synopsis: Paraphrase is a series of stand-alone short stories. Each story has a different emotion to it, normally towards the end. 1) Paraphrase 2) Full Throttle to the Top (Doteppen made Masshigura) 3) Cross Road 4) Sympathetic Pins - Telepathy of Love (Koi suru ishindenshin A horny acupuncture doctor is sick and tired of treating old hags, so the appearance of the American hunk at this sexual peak is a welcome surprise! 5) Gataiyoihanshinkaku 6) On the Otherside of the Fog (Kemuri no Mukou gawa) An possesive, overbearing friend with an unrequited love is frustrated that he is being ignored. At what lengths will he go to force his friend to look his way? (Source: M-U)

data.title: Secret Area: Kinryouku
data.synopsis: 1. Feel so Good 2. Carry the Day 3. Daring Signal 4. Red Angel 5. Our Practical Romance Guide 6. Slow Step

data.title: Nemunoki no Geshukusou
data.synopsis: Chidori absolutely hates men. For her entire life, she's been forced to put up with a bunch of irresponsible, useless slackers, and she's sick of it. Can one innocent little lie change how she feels about men? (Source: Storm in Heaven)

data.title: Kokoro Kikai.
data.synopsis: "Are we all really alive?" Shinobu, a high school student, questions as he spends each day just passing the time away. (Source: mochi*mochi)

data.title: Junai Virus
data.synopsis: Collection of 4 one shots: 1) Lover's Virus: Shimatsu becomes a 'guardian angel' to well known playboy Senmami. What is the reason for Shimatsu's dedication? 2) Piano Lesson: Loads of angst in this story about a piano prodigy who's reunited with his best friend after 4 years of absence. They then live happily ever after... or not. Tarako Kotobuki's oneshot has both clean art and a decent, angst-filled plot. 3) Loveless: Yasuri attempts suicide with his best friend's girlfriend. Is he prepared to pay the price for his selfish actions? 4) Monkey Punch: Twins that were torn apart at a tender age due to a rare disease but through times of betrayal and violence can Motouya and Uryuu still find love? (Source: mangaupdates)

data.title: Koi no Sekken Hour
data.synopsis: Soap demon decides to "cleanse" boy when he visits the public bath. (Source: MU)

data.title: Momoiro Sausage
data.synopsis: 2) How to Keep a Mean Guy Momose tells Kaoru that he wants to break up, but Kaoru asks, "Were we going out?" Kaoru is a perverted playboy from a family of seductive men and women. Momose is his childhood friend who loves him. But even though Kaoru holds him, Momose knows Kaoru can never be the kind of dependable guy he needs. 4)Milk Since Yoshiharu's drunken confession to Takiyuki three months ago they've been dating, but Yoshiharu can't seem to get anywhere physically with Takiyuki. Maybe some hypnotism or an aphrodisiac... 5)Flower Arrangement of Love Daikichi is the son of a yakuza, but his real joy in life is sexually harassing Saburou, the son of his father's teacher. Saburou wants nothing to do with sex-obsessed Daikichi. But Daikichi doesn't always play fair... (from B-U)

data.title: Oyome ni Oide yo!
data.synopsis: 1. Oyome ni Oide yo! 2. Mr. Valentine! 3. Love♥Bubble♥Bathtime 4. Aiyoku no Hibi 5. Shiri Hore! Wan-Wan 6. Shinzou Fukuzetsu Kussetsu 7. Sandbag-chan No.2

data.title: Tonari no Shibafu
title_synonyms: The grass of the next house is always green
data.synopsis: 1) Dearest neighbour I love you The hero realizes he has been in love with his best friend since their childhood. He suffers from his friend who is slow on the uptake 2) Candy candy The elementary school teacher teaches privately his pupil who is poor at exercise of vaulting box after school hour. But the pupil takes aphrodisiac because the teacher tries to confiscate it... 3) A cockhound & bestial wrestler contributes the Police Department for his image improvement by being photogenic subject of the poster with a twin child idol. A child idol wears a double face and overreacts against wrestler's sexual harassment. The lighting stand falls down and the wrestler sustains serious injuries to protect the child... 4) Very hilarious fantasy: In "Japan Air Self-Defense Force", there is really a christmas executive branch... 5) The immoral couple between a student and a teacher is annoyed by another couple of teachers at love crisis... 6) Very dark story. The twin brothers whose parents died were taken in separately by relatives. But one cleverer brother pretends another one and real another brother comes to revenge after his step mother died... 7) Hero has been annoyed by his burdensome friend from their childhood. Hero gets angry to find the baby of his friend, the result of the failure of anticonception... 8) The senior student goes to the university of Tokyo to escape from his junior student who only had sex with him for pleasure. But they meet again as a private tutor and his student... (from B-U)

data.title: Bishounen no Koi
data.synopsis: Jet and Chin are friends and gigolos that live together. One day Jet sees a guy at a gallery and falls in love with him. When Chin asks Jet about his day Jet tells him about the guy he fell in love with at a gallery. Out of the blue the guy from the gallery calls up Jet and sets up a time to meet each other. Will Jet's love be enough to keep the two together? (from B-U)

data.title: Blurry Moon
data.synopsis: Around the time that Hinaki Mitsura climbed his way to number two host in the club, Tsukayama Satoshi transfers from a branch store. He was Mitsura’s senior in high school, and also the cause of Mitsura’s most devastating memory. Tsukayama proceeds to take over as top host, surpassing Mitsura and the man he has been living with, Miura-san. Miura-san is kind, gentle, and wants to protect and love Mitsura. But Mitsura’s heart is closed, that is until Tsukayama starts to work his way under Mitsura’s skin. His growing attraction to the arrogant one who caused a deep scar under the full moon is a source of confusion and suffering, and he begins to question everything he is - everything he has worked to become. This love story vividly depicts the human drama among hosts, under the blurry moon. (from B-U)

data.title: Koiseyo Shounen
data.synopsis: A collection of one-shots. Most of these stories are teen boys with teen boys. The exception is story #2 this is an older teen (at least) with what looks to me like a pre-adolescent boy. 1) The Letter From Canada 2) Love Is Pure, Desire Is Maternal Affection!? 3) Like Or Love 4) Be Honest…

data.title: Body Talk
data.synopsis: The many oneshots are interesting and as sketchy and rough as they seem, the artwork is actually amazingly precise in Inomoto Rikako's own personal style. The stories are not very complicated and there is an abundance of eroticism. A little too much action and not very developed storylines, some might say. But there's really only so much that can happen in oneshots. (Source: M-U)

data.title: Boku dake no Peach Supplement
data.title_japanese: 僕だけのピーチサプリ
data.synopsis: 1. Kyuuai Display (Candid Love Proposition) 2. Kare to Kareshi no Kagai Jugyou (His Tutor and Him) 3. Shouten wa Ato Break (Arduous Love Journey) 4. Onaji Omoide Dakishimete (A Mutual Embrace) 5. Take-out Happy 6. Very Very Happy Day's
